question: Sleeping on bedding messed by a wet dream...i would like to know if it is possible to sleep on the soiled bedding, if the sperm has dried up.
answer:
QUESTION
i often have wet dreams,once a week,and at times twice a week. everytime i have a wet dream i ask for my bedding(duvey n bedsheet) to be changed. since i am having wet dreams oftion, its becomming embaressing to ask to change my bedding. i would like to know if it is possible to sleep on the soiled bedding,if the sperm has dried up.
ANSWER


Share:
To sleep with soiled clothing is in order but to do that unnecessarily is not appropriate. (Tahtaawi vol.5 pg.135)

Hence, it would be in order to sleep on soiled bedding on which there is no wetness of the impurity. Preferably, one should try to wear such clothing that will prevent the bedding from being soiled.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
